name: Rat Pack Pack Rat
description:
You are a pack rat from a rat pack who needs to stuff food in his little rat pack while avoiding other rats packing heat.

Controls are simple WASD or arrow keys to move, and the E key to pick up the nearest food item or climb back into your burrow.

I definitely overscoped this one and had to pivot hard on the game and it's pretty crappy as a result. The most painful was losing the inventory system because I didn't have the time to create working items for it. But at the very least I can now say I've technically created a working game, so I'll call it a win.
